html:
2.15.22  7:18 am   will you serenade me with a new song ( with video ) ?

      sure

2.15.22  4:24 am   in "hallelujah", at 1:59 the horse starts crying... is this because the 4 chord in the song has now changed to a minor iv which sounds more melancholy and sad? because those are the feelings i associate with that chord

     i was going to say no but now that i think about it yes

     also, it would be cool if you wrote more songs around that chord (or the b6 of the major scale in a similar context i think, i'm not very good at music theory)

     that's a tool i always have in my back pocket. actually it's in the side pocket

2.15.22  2:07 am   how to slow down time ? 

      you'll want to get yourself into a strong gravitational field

2.15.22  1:41 am   d'you ever look at a baby and just wanna chuck it across the room like a football?

      no, but to be fair it's been a long time since i've looked at a baby

2.15.22  12:14 am   when will you find out how to make videos so you get tell me already

      pretty soon. i'd say by the end of the year i'll know

2.14.22  10:33 pm   what do you think exists?

      you might have to do it

2.14.22  10:05 pm   what's the last reason you've needed to use earplugs

      block out the haters

2.14.22  9:40 pm   what's your newest song's eta

      march 8, 2022

2.14.22  8:39 pm   Whats the record of songs released by someone?

     song-a-day mann is in the 4000s i think

     Any plan to beat the highscore?

     no

2.14.22  7:41 pm   Does the moon get bored?

      no. its orbit is bonkers enough to keep anyone entertained

2.14.22  6:51 pm   Are you ever going to make a video about velcro? You said you would in an episode of Wild Frolicking Adventures of Informational Education.

      all options are on the table

2.14.22  6:19 pm   do you ever just

      yes i'm doing it right now

2.14.22  6:07 pm   I asked a question from an unspecified amount of time ago (i forgor) and I've scrolled for about 2 hours and couldn't find it. Any ideas for the whereabouts of it?

      it's right here

2.14.22  5:49 pm   Bill, how do I choose between the safe life path (engineering) that I'm currently on and my true passion (filmmaking) that has no guarantee of a stable wage or stable life?

      for now just start making films in your free time

2.14.22  5:13 pm   what should i do to make life more interesting

      do everything with the other hand

2.14.22  4:58 pm   What's your process of producing a song

     i'm not sure

     and how do you know when you're done?

     it was already done before i started. everything else is extra credit

2.14.22  4:36 pm   what do people who have each other as a valentine do together

      purchase seasonal merchandise

2.14.22  12:57 pm   I feel weird when I make 'art' with the intent of a metaphorical subtext, since I sometimes look at things I see in the real world, and I find them so beautiful and pretty that they can't possibly not be art. how do you balance the alluding and the actual? 

      that's easy. just do it 50% of the time. keep a log

2.14.22  11:46 am   is the best way to create something to just start somewhere and see where it goes?

      i'll admit, that's one of the ways. no one knows if that's the best way. no one knows if any of the ways are even good

2.14.22  11:09 am   how do you get ideas for your songs?

      i have a basket to catch the ideas, but sometimes the basket itself inspires me

2.14.22  10:57 am   would you prefer a keyboard with a qwerty layout or an abcdefg layout?

      qwerty

2.14.22  7:51 am   What do you think about people copying your style?

     i didn't notice

     Would that affect your resolve to keep making leVideos?

      it makes it even more important that i provide more styles for them to copy next

2.14.22  6:55 am   i just realised 'i can play' features the line 'i've got no reason to go home when i know that it's not that fun', answering my question relating to a song of yours including the concept of not going home, what was the motivation behind this? was it a specific turning your back on wanting to go home in the past ('i wanna go home', 'go home', 'home'),

     2 out of 3 of those songs were in the future at that time

      was it melodically motivated wherein the lyrics were driven by the song intuitively, or was it just right in the moment

      the core of that song is about the desire to write songs embracing free-will more fully. at least that's probably what the beginning is about. the first few lines are expressing the wanting to be free from doing what is expected. i cannot guarantee that the later parts of the song are about that, because if i followed through with this then it wouldn't be

2.14.22  2:49 am   how important is art, objectively 

      .6 to .8 oiu (objective importance units)

2.14.22  2:47 am   how do you like the exquisite taste of water?

      that's a trick question, because you didn't give an option for me to think the taste of water is not exquisite. that's like if you asked me what wednesday day is it today

2.14.22  1:11 am   How are your songs so good?

      they might be about you

2.14.22  1:09 am   have you ever read about thinking

      sure

2.13.22  11:17 pm   what does it mean to u to get over something or someone,....... examples welcome

      i think it means it was bothering you before, but now it doesn't bother you anymore. like if your country suddenly started measuring everything in fathoms. it might bother you at first but then you'd get over it

2.13.22  11:08 pm   why do you make videos?

      to possibly *influence* you

2.13.22  10:54 pm   is your car still bad?

      it's worse

2.13.22  10:31 pm   what's a fun new way to pronounce your name 

      "michael jordan"

2.13.22  10:11 pm   Are you uploading a new video soon?

     i'm not sure

      Also good night :)

2.13.22  10:11 pm   In the music videos you've made, have you ever added sounds or audio that weren't in the original song?

      extremely rarely but it never goes on top of the song audio. it would be at the end

2.13.22  9:39 pm   Do you like non songs?

      yes

2.13.22  9:13 pm   opinions on physics??

      i think left and right may be backwards, but that's none of my business

2.13.22  8:36 pm   how do you make your videos

      i don't really know yet

2.13.22  7:22 pm   what is a "masterpiece"

      that's just a regular piece

2.13.22  6:45 pm   how's your weekend goin'?

      pretty good

2.13.22  6:29 pm   i cant see a way through

      that's ok. it's there

2.13.22  5:50 pm   how do you feel about engineering a new sky

      pretty good

2.13.22  5:38 pm   please save the universe bill

      i think this is one of the self-saving ones

2.13.22  5:10 pm   what happens after death, there are an infinite amount of theories tho most importantly i'd like to hear yours

      missing some details of the scenario: what happens to what and/or whom, after whose death

2.13.22  5:04 pm   how long did it take for you to learn how to animate? (2d and 3d)

      2% of it has taken me about 5 years. so at this rate, that works out to about 250 years

2.13.22  3:53 pm   why dont you ever use capital letters?

      i do, but why don't you

2.13.22  4:40 am   how every does it get

      how much can you handle

2.13.22  3:45 am   Have you ever written a song where the lyrical content includes the concept of NOT going home

      yes

2.12.22  11:40 pm   How to be lucky?

      it happens automatically................ sometimes

2.12.22  9:59 pm   how important is music theory

      music theory is just music. so i guess a follow up question would be how important is music

2.12.22  9:58 pm   in the 'more than a dream' video, there's a part where you turn the days of the week into a rapid string of adjectives, starting at good-bad and growing more obscure as it goes on. i  count two non-adjectives in the bunch, though - 'yes' and 'brunt'. 'yes' is a funny, common enough choice, so i could see the reasoning there, but where exactly did 'brunt' [noun for the blunt impact of an attack or force] come out of? 

      once you loosen up, you find things come crawling out of every corner of the universe

2.12.22  9:05 pm   does your next song contain the word "dream"?

      no
